mapper.sql: select p.id, p.user_id, u.user_name, p.node_id, n.name as node_name, p.permission_type, p.can_view, p.can_operate, p.can_manage, p.can_create_instance, p.expire_time, p.status, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark from sys_user_node_server p left join sys_user u on p.user_id = u.user_id left join node_server n on p.node_id = n.id
mapper.select: select distinct node_id from sys_user_node_server where user_id = #{userId} and status = '0' and (expire_time is null or expire_time > now())

select count(*) from sys_user_node_server where user_id = #{userId} and node_id = #{nodeId} and status = '0' and (expire_time is null or expire_time > now()) and ( (#{permission} = 'view' and can_view = 1) or (#{permission} = 'operate' and can_operate = 1) or (#{permission} = 'manage' and can_manage = 1) or (#{permission} = 'create' and can_create_instance = 1) or (#{permission} = 'admin' and permission_type = 'admin') )
mapper.delete: delete from sys_user_node_server where id in #{id}
